title: William Arthur T-497 Wedding Invitation Font
content:
This is William Arthur typeface T-497, used on a wedding invitation. Can anyone identify the font name or something very similar?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150410092507im_/http:/typophile.com/files/katie_4634.jpg)
author: angelwing75

comments.content: Most probably another custom job by Hallmark and exclusive for William Arthur. You may like the work of [Stephen Rapp](http://web.archive.org/web/20150410092507/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Stephen_Rapp): Memoir, Montague Script, Hiatus...

Another designer with some beautiful, yet personal-looking, scripts is Laura Worthington. Her [Alana](http://web.archive.org/web/20150410092507/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/laura-worthington/alana/?refby=bowfin) is similar, and has many alternates allowing a choice of fancy-to-plain script looks.

Another prolific designer, who used to work for Hallmark is [Rob Leuschke](http://web.archive.org/web/20150410092507/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Leuschke/fonts/).

- Mike Yanega

Seems to be called AliceFrancesHMK.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150410092507im_/http:/typophile.com/files/katha1_3814.jpg)
  
Luc Devroye says: "In 2012, we find a file with 107 free fonts on the Hallmark site as a support file for Hallmark Card Studio 2012. That collection: AliceFrancesHmk, ... "
